QuestData.Title: The Field of Ferocity: Master of the Hunt!
QuestData.Description:
This is it. You and your pals have hit the big time. A match against the champ, Huntmaster Amaa herself. Don't pat yourself on the back just yet. She's ruthless. It was nice knowing you.
After she kills you, can I have your stuff?
QuestData.RewardText: You are quite the impressive and fearsome combatant. The centaurs are in awe of you. Gurgthock is fuming for not betting his farm on you instead of Amaa. You win the grand prize.
